Air Pistol.name: Pistolet à air comprimé
Air Pistol.description: Un pistolet moyen ui tire des billes de peinture (et d'acide ! page 347).

Big Knucks.name: Super poings
Big Knucks.description: Cybermatériel de type Arme. Vous devez avoir installé le cybermatériel approprié.

Chainsaw.name: Tronçonneuse
Chainsaw.description: Une Tronçonneuse qui fonctionne avec du CHOOH². 2-3 heures d'utilisation par réservoir.

Combat Knife.name: Couteau de Combat
Combat Knife.description: Un couteau adapté aux combats de rues.

Constitution Arms Hurricane Assault Weap.name: Constitution Arms Hurricane Assault Weapon
Constitution Arms Hurricane Assault Weap.description: An Exotic Shotgun with 2 ROF. Cannot make aimed shots and needs BODY 11 or higher (unless mounted). Refer to the full item description on pg. 348.

Crowbar.name: Crowbar
Crowbar.description: Useful as both a tool and a weapon. A rod of iron with split wedges on the ends.

Cybersnake.name: Cybercobra
Cybersnake.description: Cybermatériel de type Arme. Vous devez avoir installé le cybermatériel approprié.

Dartgun.name: Pistolet à fléchettes
Dartgun.description: An Exotic Very Heavy Pistol. Refer to the full item description on pg. 348.

Excellent Baseball Bat.name: Excellent Baseball Bat
Excellent Baseball Bat.description: A firmly weighted bat. A favourite weapon of the Baseball Furies. +1 to Attack.

Excellent Bow.name: Excellent Bow
Excellent Bow.description: A revitalized bow that must be reloaded after every attack. +1 to Attack.

Excellent Chainsaw.name: Excellent Chainsaw
Excellent Chainsaw.description: A portable, refuelable saw that runs on CHOOH2. Lasts about 2-3 hours on one tank. +1 to Attack.

Excellent Combat Knife.name: Excellent Combat Knife
Excellent Combat Knife.description: A knife fit for the streets. +1 to Attack.

Excellent Crossbow.name: Excellent Crossbow
Excellent Crossbow.description: A crossbow which must be reloaded after every attack. +1 to Attack.

Excellent Crowbar.name: Excellent Crowbar
Excellent Crowbar.description: Useful as both a tool and a weapon. A rod of iron with split wedges on the ends. +1 to Attack.

Excellent Grenade Launcher.name: Excellent Grenade Launcher
Excellent Grenade Launcher.description: A high-impact grenade launcher. You can use a variety of grenades with this. +1 to Attack.

Excellent Heavy Pistol.name: Pistolet lourd d'excellente qualité
Excellent Heavy Pistol.description: Un pistolet lourd. Dissimulable. +1 au jet d'attaque.

Excellent Heavy SMG.name: Pistolet-mitrailleur lourd d'excellente qualité
Excellent Heavy SMG.description: Un pistolet-mitrailleur lourd. Non dissimulable. +1 au jet d'attaque.

Excellent Helicopter Blades.name: Excellent Helicopter Blades
Excellent Helicopter Blades.description: Taken from a derelict aircraft, these blades are capable of slicing most things easily. +1 to Attack.

Excellent Lead Pipe.name: Excellent Lead Pipe
Excellent Lead Pipe.description: A hollow cylinder, typically made of metal or fiberglass. It may have conveyed fluids once. +1 to Attack.

Excellent Machete.name: Excellent Machete
Excellent Machete.description: A long-bladed knife with a variety of uses. Known to be a favourite to some gangs of Night City. +1 to Attack.

Excellent Medium Pistol.name: Pistolet moyen d'excellente qualité
Excellent Medium Pistol.description: Un pistolet de taille moyenne. Dissimulable. +1 au jet d'attaque.

Excellent Naginata.name: Excellent Naginata
Excellent Naginata.description: A japanese wooden pole with a curved blade on one side. Favoured by Arasaka tactical teams for close engagements. +1 to Attack.

Excellent Rocket Launcher.name: Excellent Rocket Launcher
Excellent Rocket Launcher.description: Bring out the big guns. This rocket launcher will do some damage. +1 to Attack.

Excellent Sledgehammer.name: Excellent Sledgehammer
Excellent Sledgehammer.description: A large mallet-like object with a flat metal head which distributes impacted force over a wide area. +1 to Attack.

Excellent Sniper Rifle.name: Excellent Sniper Rifle
Excellent Sniper Rifle.description: A long-distance sniper rifle. Holds 4 bullets in a magazine. +1 to Attack.

Excellent Spiked Bat.name: Excellent Spiked Bat
Excellent Spiked Bat.description: An advancement over a regular bat. A number of nails have been hammered through towards the tip. +1 to Attack.

Excellent Sword.name: Épée d'excellente qualité
Excellent Sword.description: Une arme avec une lame et une poignée. Conçue pour couper. +1 au jet d'attaque.

Excellent Tomahawk.name: Excellent Tomahawk
Excellent Tomahawk.description: A light axe that can be thrown. +1 to Attack.

Excellent Very Heavy Pistol.name: Pistolet très lourd d'excellente qualité
Excellent Very Heavy Pistol.description: Un pistolet très lourd. Non dissimulable. +1 au jet d'attaque.

Flamethrower.name: Flamethrower
Flamethrower.description: An Exotic Shotgun that uses the Heavy Weapons Skill. Refer to the full item description on pg. 348.

Grenade Launcher.name: Grenade Launcher
Grenade Launcher.description: A high-impact grenade launcher. You can use a variety of grenades with this.

Helicopter Blades.name: Helicopter Blades
Helicopter Blades.description: Taken from a derelict aircraft, these blades are capable of slicing most things easily.

Kendachi Mono-Three.name: Kendachi Mono-Three
Kendachi Mono-Three.description: An Exotic, Excellent Quality, Two-Handed Very Heavy Melee Weapon. It appears as a high-tech katana. Refer to the full item description on pg. 348.

Lead Pipe.name: Lead Pipe
Lead Pipe.description: A hollow cylinder, typically made of metal or fiberglass. It may have conveyed fluids once.

Machete.name: Machete
Machete.description: A long-bladed knife with a variety of uses. Known to be a favourite to some gangs of Night City.

Malorian Arms 3516.name: Malorian Arms 3516
Malorian Arms 3516.description: An Exotic, Excellent Quality Very Heavy Pistol. You must connect to this device with a Smartgun Link. Refer to the full item description on pg. 348.

Microwaver.name: Microwaver
Microwaver.description: An Exotic Very Heavy Pistol. Can cause cyberware or electrical components to be rendered inoperable for a minute. Refer to the full item description on pg. 348.

Militech \"Cowboy\" U-56 Grenade Launche.name: Militech "Cowboy" U-56 Grenade Launcher
Militech \"Cowboy\" U-56 Grenade Launche.description: An Exotic Grenade Launcher with 2 ROF. Holds four grenades. Requires BODY 11 or higher (unless mounted). Refer to the full item description on pg. 349.

Naginata.name: Naginata
Naginata.description: A japanese wooden pole with a curved blade on one side. Favoured by Arasaka tactical teams for close engagements.

Poor Assault Rifle.name: Fusil d'assaut de mauvaise qualité
Poor Assault Rifle.description: Un fusil d'assaut. Si vous faites 1 sur un jet d'attaque (Échec critique) l'arme est enrayée et cela nécessite une action pour le désenrayer.

Poor Baseball Bat.name: Poor Baseball Bat
Poor Baseball Bat.description: A firmly weighted bat. A favourite weapon of the Baseball Furies. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit Fail) the weapon fails in some way and requires an action to be made usable again.

Poor Bow.name: Poor Bow
Poor Bow.description: A revitalized bow that must be reloaded after every attack. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the gun jams and requires using an action to clear.

Poor Chainsaw.name: Poor Chainsaw
Poor Chainsaw.description: A portable, refuelable saw that runs on CHOOH2. Lasts about 2-3 hours on one tank. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit Fail) the weapon fails in some way and requires an action to be made usable again.

Poor Combat Knife.name: Poor Combat Knife
Poor Combat Knife.description: A knife fit for the streets. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit Fail) the weapon fails in some way and requires an action to be made usable again.

Poor Crossbow.name: Poor Crossbow
Poor Crossbow.description: A crossbow which must be reloaded after every attack. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the gun jams and requires using an action to clear.

Poor Crowbar.name: Poor Crowbar
Poor Crowbar.description: Useful as both a tool and a weapon. A rod of iron with split wedges on the ends. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit Fail) the weapon fails in some way and requires an action to be made usable again.

Poor Grenade Launcher.name: Poor Grenade Launcher
Poor Grenade Launcher.description: A high-impact grenade launcher. You can use a variety of grenades with this. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the gun jams and requires using an action to clear.

Poor Heavy Pistol.name: Pistolet lourd de mauvaise qualité
Poor Heavy Pistol.description: Un pistolet lourd. Dissimulable. Si vous faites 1 sur un jet d'attaque (Échec critique) le pistolet est enrayé et cela nécessite une action pour le désenrayer.

Poor Heavy SMG.name: Pistolet-mitrailleur lourd de mauvaise qualité
Poor Heavy SMG.description: Pistolet-mitrailleur lourd. Non dissimulable. Si vous faites 1 sur un jet d'attaque (Échec critique) l'arme est enrayée et cela nécessite une action pour le désenrayer.

Poor Helicopter Blades.name: Poor Helicopter Blades
Poor Helicopter Blades.description: Taken from a derelict aircraft, these blades are capable of slicing most things easily. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit Fail) the weapon fails in some way and requires an action to be made usable again.

Poor Lead Pipe.name: Poor Lead Pipe
Poor Lead Pipe.description: A hollow cylinder, typically made of metal or fiberglass. It may have conveyed fluids once. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit Fail) the weapon fails in some way and requires an action to be made usable again.

Poor Machete.name: Poor Machete
Poor Machete.description: A long-bladed knife with a variety of uses. Known to be a favourite to some gangs of Night City. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit Fail) the weapon fails in some way and requires an action to be made usable again.

Poor Medium Pistol.name: Pistolet moyen de mauvaise qualité
Poor Medium Pistol.description: Un pistolet de taille moyenne de mauvaise qualité. Dissimulable. Si vous faites 1 sur un jet d'attaque (Échec critique) le pistolet est enrayé et cela nécessite une action pour le désenrayer.

Poor Naginata.name: Poor Naginata
Poor Naginata.description: A japanese wooden pole with a curved blade on one side. Favoured by Arasaka tactical teams for close engagements. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit Fail) the weapon fails in some way and requires an action to be made usable again.

Poor Rocket Launcher.name: Poor Rocket Launcher
Poor Rocket Launcher.description: Bring out the big guns. This rocket launcher will do some damage. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the gun jams and requires using an action to clear.

Poor SMG.name: Pistolet-mitrailleur de mauvaise qualité
Poor SMG.description: Pistolet-mitrailleur. Dissimulable. Si vous faites 1 sur un jet d'attaque (Échec critique) l'arme est enrayée et cela nécessite une action pour le désenrayer.

Poor Shotgun.name: Poor Shotgun
Poor Shotgun.description: An all-purpose shotgun. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the gun jams and requires using an action to clear.

Poor Sledgehammer.name: Poor Sledgehammer
Poor Sledgehammer.description: A large mallet-like object with a flat metal head which distributes impacted force over a wide area. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit Fail) the weapon fails in some way and requires an action to be made usable again.

Poor Sniper Rifle.name: Poor Sniper Rifle
Poor Sniper Rifle.description: A long-distance sniper rifle. Holds 4 bullets in a magazine. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit fail) the gun jams and requires using an action to clear.

Poor Spiked Bat.name: Poor Spiked Bat
Poor Spiked Bat.description: An advancement over a regular bat. A number of nails have been hammered through towards the tip. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit Fail) the weapon fails in some way and requires an action to be made usable again.

Poor Sword.name: Épée de mauvaise qualité
Poor Sword.description: Une arme avec une lame et une poignée. Conçue pour couper. Si vous faites 1 sur un jet d'attaque (Échec critique) l'attaque échoue et cela nécessite une action afin que l'arme soit à nouveau utilisable.

Poor Tomahawk.name: Poor Tomahawk
Poor Tomahawk.description: A light axe that can be thrown. If you roll 1 on Attack (Crit Fail) the weapon fails in some way and requires an action to be made usable again.

Poor Very Heavy Pistol.name: Pistolet très lourd de mauvaise qualité
Poor Very Heavy Pistol.description: Un pistolet très lourd. Non dissimulable. Si vous faites 1 sur un jet d'attaque (Échec critique) le pistolet est enrayé et cela nécessite une action pour le désenrayer.

Rhinemetall EMG-86 Railgun.name: Rhinemetall EMG-86 Railgun
Rhinemetall EMG-86 Railgun.description: An Exotic Assault Rifle. It cannot make Aimed or Autofire Shots. Requires BODY 11 or higher (unless mounted). Refer to the full item description on pg. 349.

Rippers.name: Éventreurs
Rippers.description: Cybermatériel de type Arme. Vous devez avoir installé le cybermatériel approprié.

Rocket Launcher.name: Rocket Launcher
Rocket Launcher.description: Bring out the big guns. This rocket launcher will do some damage.

Shrieker.name: Shrieker
Shrieker.description: An Exotic Very Heavy Pistol. Requires ear protection to prevent Damaged Ear critical injuries. The target must beat a DV15 Resist Torture/Drugs Check or suffer the critical injury. Refer to the full item description on pg. 349.

Sledgehammer.name: Sledgehammer
Sledgehammer.description: A large mallet-like object with a flat metal head which distributes impacted force over a wide area.

Slice N' Dice.name: Slice N' Dice
Slice N' Dice.description: Cybermatériel de type Arme. Vous devez avoir installé le cybermatériel approprié.

Sniper Rifle.name: Sniper Rifle
Sniper Rifle.description: A long-distance sniper rifle. Holds 4 bullets in a magazine.

Spiked Bat.name: Spiked Bat
Spiked Bat.description: An advancement over a regular bat. A number of nails have been hammered through towards the tip.

Stun Baton.name: Stun Baton
Stun Baton.description: An Exotic, One-handed Medium Melee Weapon. Target is knocked unconscious if damage dealt would reduce them to under 1 HP. Doesn't cause Critical Injuries or ablate armor. Refer to the full item description on pg. 349.

Stun Gun.name: Stun Gun
Stun Gun.description: An Exotic Heavy Pistol.  Target is knocked unconscious if damage dealt would reduce them to under 1 HP. Doesn't cause Critical Injuries or ablate armor. Refer to the full item description on pg. 349.

Sword.name: Épée
Sword.description: Une arme avec une lame et une poignée.

Talon Foot.name: Ergot
Talon Foot.description: Cybermatériel de type Arme. Vous devez avoir installé le cybermatériel approprié.

Tomahawk.name: Tomahawk
Tomahawk.description: A light axe that can be thrown.

Tsunami Arms Helix.name: Tsunami Arms Helix
Tsunami Arms Helix.description: An Exotic Assault Rifle that uses only Autofire. Holds 40 bullets, using 20 bullets with each attack. Uses Autofire rules with a multiplication up to a maximum of 5. Requires BODY 11 or higher (unless mounted). Refer to the full item description on pg. 349.

Unarmed.name: Désarmé
Unarmed.description: Utilise ses poings/pieds pour attaquer, n'ignore pas de moité l'armure.

Vampyres.name: Vampyres
Vampyres.description: Cybermatériel de type Arme. Vous devez avoir installé le cybermatériel approprié.

Wolvers.name: Etripeurs
Wolvers.description: Cybermatériel de type Arme. Vous devez avoir installé le cybermatériel approprié.
